title: Secret Potion - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Oneshot
author: Amazingvahn
description:
Jaly found a mysterious book inside their school library. It's a book which teaches one how to make a love potion.

And she will use this love option on her crush who has never noticed her before.

Will it be effective? Or will it embarrass her in front in front of her ultimate crush?>
